name: Doxylamine
summary: An over-the-counter first-generation antihistamine with sedative properties, often used for short-term insomnia relief.
description: Doxylamine is a first-generation antihistamine (H1 receptor antagonist) commonly found in over-the-counter sleep aids and nighttime cold preparations. Its strong sedative effects make it effective for short-term management of insomnia. It is also used in combination with pyridoxine for nausea and vomiting during pregnancy (Diclegis in the U.S.).

off_label_uses: Nausea and vomiting of pregnancy (in combination with pyridoxine)
contraindications: Hypersensitivity to doxylamine or other antihistamines

items: Nighttime allergy or cold symptom relief

sections.text: Blocks histamine H1 receptors in the brain, producing sedation; also exhibits anticholinergic effects.

adult.nausea_pregnancy: 10 mg doxylamine + 10 mg pyridoxine (Diclegis) 2 tablets at bedtime; may titrate

sections.geriatric: Lower doses recommended due to increased sensitivity to sedative and anticholinergic effects
sections.hepatic_impairment: Use with caution; avoid in severe impairment for Diclegis
sections.renal_impairment: No adjustment, but use with caution

items: Diclegis delayed-release tablets: doxylamine 10 mg + pyridoxine 10 mg

sections.text: Onset within 30 minutes; duration of sedation typically 6–8 hours.

other: Avoid use in elderly due to anticholinergic burden
Caution in patients with asthma or COPD
Avoid alcohol and other CNS depressants

sections.pregnancy: Safe when used as Diclegis combination for NVP
sections.lactation: Small amounts excreted in breast milk; monitor infant for sedation
sections.pediatrics: Not recommended for children under 12 for insomnia
sections.geriatrics: Avoid routine use due to anticholinergic burden

sections.text: Not typically required for short-term use; if used long-term, gradual reduction may minimize rebound insomnia.

items: Commonly marketed as an OTC sleep aid under various brand names
One of the most sedating first-generation antihistamines
Also available in combination cold/flu products

seo.title: Doxylamine: OTC Sleep Aid & Antihistamine
seo.description: Doxylamine is a sedating antihistamine used over-the-counter for short-term insomnia, and in combination with pyridoxine for pregnancy-related nausea.
